website_summaries.verdict: You'll get a wide range of pieces at an affordable price, although some buyers felt the size and quality could have been better.
pros: 15-piece set that includes a sturdy compass and a graphic compass, as well as 2 different protractors
Measurements are in inches and centimeters
Designed for all levels of use
cons: Pieces arrived smaller than expected, and some said the quality was on the cheap side
Some of these arrived missing parts

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor - May Be Missing Some Contents
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived open, with an empty plastic tube and missing the extra lead for the compass and the "metal divider." Will update after use ... Compasses don't lock, will see how well they work out.
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very into Bullet Journaling and got a bit swept up in the mandala phase that's sweeping the BuJo fandom. I wanted to get a compass but also needed a new clear ruler for my journal as I lost mine. This kit had both so I grabbed it since it was definitely affordable. Great choice on my part! Everything is great quality, and you get so much for so little. Plus a little mustache sticker. ;) I recommended it in one of my BuJo groups as soon as I messed around with all the pieces. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kat Walls

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter needed a protractor for her class, I ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter needed a protractor for her class, I got her a so-call protractor with a plastic compass from Walmart which was not much help in her geometry class and cost almost as much as Mr. Pen's 15 pcs kit. I bought this 15 pcs compass set on Amazon (a kit I have not seen in more than fifty years) for her. She told me everyone in her class including her math teacher was impressed and wanted to know where she got it. This kit is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: CalvinP

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Compass was corroded, would not hold lead, items seemed flimsy, "zipper" broke off the bag first time I closed it. Complete waste of time and now I have to send it back. What gets me is that I didn't want to leave the house right now because of COVID and thought I was purchasing a quality item online. Instead of bringing back yet another shoddy product purchased on Amazon back to the UPS store for a refund, I should have just gone to a brick-and-mortar in the first place.

customer_reviews.title: Well-equipped set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. I took 1 star away because the protractor with the arm came pretty scratched up. The photos, unfortunately don't show then as well as when they're looked at with the bare eye. I'm wondering if it might have been a return because some items don't have the plastic covering that other items that are similar in size and shape have. It's still useable and will probably end up getting scratched, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Kardos

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two packages for my boys geometry lessons. Items in one package had visible signs of rust and it looked like the package had been opened previously. Tried the pencil holding compass in the other package and it fell apart. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kfamily04

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, compass makes spirals instead of circles.
customer_reviews.text: Very bad cheap quality. The compass makes ellipses instead of circles :). Actually spirals as it keeps on opening wider and wider as you try to make a circle.
customer_reviews.author: S S

customer_reviews.title: Only mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use at school. When it arrived, I thought it was fine. However when she started using it, we discover several issues related to the compass tips. Essential the tips in this set are of inferior quality. They were either broken or jammed in the holder. Everything else seems okay, but the quality seems cheap. As such she was disappointed, as was I, as we were looking forward to this all inclusive set working out for her. Maybe we were just unlucky, but I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These measuring devices do the trip
customer_reviews.text: This 15 Pcs Compass Set with Swing Arm Protractor (6"), Geometry Set did all of the measurements I needed. I was making an umbrella out of metal to cover my pet's Urn that held her asses, to keep by the pond that she often sat and rested by. This was her favorite spot, so she now has her ashes in the place she loved the best. The umbrella turned out great, and it protects the Urn from too much sun and rain. the 15 Pcs Compass Set with Swing Arm Protractor (6"), Geometry Set did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lowry Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Compasses are useless
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these kits for my daughters. The compasses do not lock and it has resulted in so much frustration that I have to now order another compass that is usable. Please save your money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Lotso protractors!
customer_reviews.text: Included in my set I got 4 separate options for protractors, 2 compasses and 1 triangle ruler thingy. The back reads many additional tools which I did not receive, hence my lower stars. Also one if the edges is chipped (see picture). I titled buyer beware because these offer no real options except sharp pointy ones! I managed to remove one stabby stabby (see pic) so I have a compass to use on my canvases because I'm an artist. I'm disappointed but I'll make it work. EDIT***** The seller reached out to me and made things right. Honesty on the internet? Who would have thunk it?¿? Would definitely do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimipk99

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I miss my 'real' drafting kit, but this will work in a pinch for my garage projects. Good enough quality for hobby and crafts. Dividers are good out to just over 5 1/4" and have enough drag to hold the measurement. The compass' have a 'functional range' out to about 4 1/2" radius. Neither compass can be locked! So, you might make a spiral unless you have a soft touch. Zero points on protractors are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Saltydog

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderfully thought out set
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderfully thought out set. The set contains an array of tools for helping beginner geometry students with an understanding of the basics in angle measurement and general form. While I purchased these for myself in my art studio for quick form work, I am also using them for instruction in both art and geometry with my great nephew.
customer_reviews.author: texasjim

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son absolutely LOOOOVES geometry, shapes, compasses, etc., etc. He was so upset when our ancient compass broke a while back. So I got him this set for his birthday. You should have seen the look on his face! Ha! There's so many choices of compasses in this kit. Rulers, pencils, eraser....even a Mr. Pen mustache sticker. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TeniseRae J.

customer_reviews.title: The gift tat keeps on giving.
customer_reviews.text: These guys put a fantastic package together. I have had this product since March of 2020 and use it for measuring my sewing and also for drawing, in particular Mandalas. I am a novice but it seems like if you wish you had something that you need in this genre, it's in the packet... a stand alone pencil...voilá..it's in the packet, a fabulous erasure...bam it's there... the measuring implements are fantastic and plenty of compasses and a cute curled mustache sticker. Its the gift that keeps on giving...No disappointment with this whatsoever! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Lone

customer_reviews.title: How FREE is free?
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the instruments that are included in the package. The PROBLEM I have is with the push for the FREE GIFT. It said "scan for your free gift but when you scan it it redirects you to another site where you have to DOWNLOAD the Messenger app to check out the FREE GIFT. This is the classic bait & switch game! It's YOUR COMPANY! Just be HONEST and TELL customers up front that they need the Messenger app to find out about their FREE GIFT from your company. That way they already know that THEY have the OPTION of downloading ANOTHER APP on their phone. HONESTY is the BEST policy.
customer_reviews.author: OrchidLover47

customer_reviews.title: VERY THIN AND FLIMSY PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: For children it wouldn’t be bad but for adults it certainly doesn’t hold up. Mine arrived scratched and chipped, it was very disappointing. The material is very thin and flimsy so one needs to be extremely gentle while handling.
customer_reviews.author: BOOKEM

customer_reviews.title: Decent Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a protractor and ruler was required for physics. I love the multiple sizes. The eraser does a good job, but produces quite a bit of shavings, especially in comparison to my Stadtler eraser. The plastic bits are thick, but they have chipped a little. It's not horrible, but should be mentioned. The plastic case the set comes in is surprisingly durable. I keep the protractors, rulers, and some other stuff in them in my backpack, with no issues outside the chipping issue mentioned earlier. It's a decent set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Compass and protactor for math
customer_reviews.text: Since school is now doing distance learning, had to get the tools for the kid so he can get his homework done. I was such a dork, when he told me he needs compass, I got him a real compass! After realizing my mistake, I immediately ordered this set for him. You never know if he will need the other tools for school! Value wise this set it wonderful. The quality is ok. He tried and likes the set. So far he has not experienced any problems using them. So to me the set was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tong

customer_reviews.title: PRESHARPEND GRAPHITE INSERTS! ❤️ LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am kinda a big nerd.. But I love this set! It's got PRESHARPEND graphite inserts for making marking the surprised easy. The tools are all light enough that small hands can use then easily. They are accurate. And they sent a small gift with purchase, I won't ruin your surprise but I guess if you mustache I may have to sticker it to ya. Ugh puns this lady's weird. I just love the kit. The plastic seems thick and durable. The tools and accurate. I'm very pleased. Thanks y'all!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Anderson

customer_reviews.title: well-conceived set of high quality at a great price. I was surprised at how sturdy the ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressive, well-conceived set of high quality at a great price. I was surprised at how sturdy the compasses feel even after playing with them a bit. All the products seem like they will hold up quite well over time. And the completeness of the kit shows that a lot of thought went into its development. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, Sturdy, Does the Job well.
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job as a compass and protractor. Be careful with the big one because the thing in the middle comes off easily. It’s very accurate and easy to use. But the pointer and led can get screwed up if you do not take great care of it. I recommend using the smaller one with the pencil and pointer because it can go great distances but i also like the bigger one. The middle one where you put the utensil in can be a loan in the but. Make sure all you’re screws are right because if they are not the pencil and pointer will fall out
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: not a professional set
customer_reviews.text: All the items specified were in the kit. It arrived promptly. The 'compasses' were not high quality or that accurate. Main problem is they rely on friction for the settings. The setting can, therefore, change to easily from a bump or accident. This requires one to start all over again. For a grammar school student, however they would probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paladin Lownotes

customer_reviews.title: A very good value for basic student drafting tools
customer_reviews.text: The set of drawing and drafting tools was exactly as described and should be very useful. These are definitely sized and designed for young students and my primary interest was in obtaining a basic compass that had a pen holder designed for markers or pens. The included compass suffices for that purpose but I will have to use it carefully and it is limited to small circles. The knurled knob to secure the pen is plastic. Bottom line this is a good value and as expected but aimed at school kids, as it is advertised.+
customer_reviews.author: Frank Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one place when needed
customer_reviews.text: Great set of handy tools, I use my set for drawing and sketching. The tools are perfect for outdoor sketching sessions, they store nicely in a zipped carrier bag and I always have what I need for my measuring. While drawing at home I use the tools to refine my sketches and while drawing portraits and landscapes. The dividers are perfect to get things like eyes and noses the right size and in the right place. The extra leads and pencils are a nice and useful touch. This set was purchased to replace my misplaced dividers, and has proven to be a must have on its own.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brookes

customer_reviews.title: a little bag with everything my boy needs for high school
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because this little kit seems to have everything my boy needs for his high school geometry class. I'm sure it has more than what he needs. Which is great considering the price of this set. I purchased it for its low price so I did not expect titanium carbon steel or something fancy. Just something that works accurately for a high school level geometry class. But on reading the "fine print" I was impressed that they offer a "no questions asked" return policy. I don't think I will need it but it is always nice to see a company that values customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value for for Geometric Drawing Tools Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for school use. It's much more compact than my professional compass and divider set in a heavy bulky case. The set also includes a small triangle set, protractor & ruler as well as a larger protractor designed for drawing the initial lines of an angle without having to connect points. The set includes many smaller very useful accessories. This set is compact and great for carrying in my backpack as I go from classroom to classroom teaching.
customer_reviews.author: Military History Navy Man

customer_reviews.title: Good Job Mr. Pen
customer_reviews.text: The quality is wonderful. I like that the majority of the compass set is made of metal. Obviously the joint parts are plastic but, still really good quality. I bought this product to use in my math class and also when I am in a mood to draw. I also like that the company includes a small note and that it made by teachers who work with intercity youth.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Low quality but at least not expensive
customer_reviews.text: The squares are very small, I hadn't paid attention to the size, but I expected them to be longer, perhaps that's documented in the description. The small square is 2.5'' per side, the long one is about 2.5'' x 4.5''. The ruler is similarly small at 6''. The compasses, there are lots of them, but all but one have loose legs so your circles don't end up being circles (most of the time). The locking compass seems usable. The kit comes with accessories like small pencils, small retractable pencil, eraser, sharpener. Overall I'd be happier with fewer pieces that have better quality. Say one large square and one locking compass and none of the other cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these based on the extensive stellar reviews, for two 14 year olds in Geometry Honors. Math teacher commented that this "type" of compass was not recommended as they are not reliable. Within a week, both sets have small parts falling off the compass, and I have no idea where the part came from. On both compasses the led is now now unsecure and falls out. With the return window now closed, we're now buying another 2 sets. Cheaper is not always a better value!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great set that I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be cheaply made because it was so inexpensive, but I was wrong!! I am VERY impressed with the quality and all the different items that are included in this Essential Geometry Set. The only thing I would recommend is to include some basic instructions. There's a lot in this set and I had to look up how to use several of them :) Maybe that's just me. Even without instructions it is a GREAT product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mistifier

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value, excellent quality, great company!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for a book I was reading. I needed a compass, a straight edge and a pencil. This particular set seemed to be everything I needed, some new things I can learn about, AND a pencil sharpener and eraser! That's the actual set. Additionally, I got a " metal precision bow compass". What???? This is a rather awesome "bonus"! I'm sending a set to my grandsons who will be thrilled with these tools. Good purchase, and worth twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A true bargain for you buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this set, all I truly cared about receiving were the compasses. They, themselves, are wonderful to work with and were exactly what I was looking for. They're of very good quality, in my opinion. I was also very happy and impressed with all of the other pieces in this set. The price for this set is amazing. The shipping was what you'd expect from Prime. And even if you don't have Prime - it would be worth the few extra bucks and price, no doubt. Also, they included a cute mustache sticker ;)
customer_reviews.author: SHANZ

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be cheaper.  They cut every corner to the max!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for half price. The only reason it deserves any stars. It is flimsy, inaccurate and tiny. I figured it would be pot metal. It's not that good. It's stamped sheet pot metal. There is no substance. If you're not going to use this often it might be barely adequate. If you're going to use it a couple of times a week it will be frustrating. I never saw a golf pencil sized mechanical pencil before!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first week
customer_reviews.text: Some of the compass's screws to tighten the lead broke within the first couple times of using it and once I replaced the lead, it was nearly impossible to secure the lead in the compass. I ended up super gluing the back of one of the screws to get it to tighten. The compass feels pretty nice in use, but quality seems very cheap. I got when half off, so for $10 you get a lot, but wouldn't recommend for full price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Essential Geometry Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wonderful essential geometry set to teach my son Geometry at home. This set contains all that I need to teach Geometry and even Algebra for my other son. Mr Pen has high quality materials and i love the fact that all items come in a clear heavy duty open and close bag to hold everything. Plus Mr. Pen's cute mustache makes learning fun,even a mustache sticker is included. This set is sitting proudly on my son;s desk. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Rainer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my pencil drawings. Boy do you get a lot of bang for the buck! Look at all the items included! And they're not cheaply made either. Metal compasses, good heavy plastic on the triangles and ruler. I used to work in the printing business as a paste up artist in years long ago and these tools were really nice to work with. I can imagine having this set as a great asset with my school supplies (if I were a student) from the time you start using a compass through college.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great set for school!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is beginning Geometry this year. At first she thought I was buying too much stuff for her lol, but she is using almost everything in this set and loves it. Most of all, she knows she is prepared...and while we're all schooling & working from home, this set has helped her to learn, study & complete her work - great bag too! Thanks....
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Drawing materials!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as an addition to my drawing materials. I knew, based on the price, that these would not be higher end items, but they did the job for what I needed. Able to draw circles, erase, use pencil, use “small” ruler, and protractors. I could see, if you were an architect, these items may not be up to snuff, but for the causal user or math student, I think these would do the trick. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Shade

customer_reviews.title: Used for marine chart navigation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a budget set for my marine charts on my sailboat. I sail on a lake so I don't need super accurate ocean tools (100s of dollars). This set let me measure distances on the chart, measure angles and record all the notes I needed. I really like all the writing tools with it so you can always jot down time / distance. plenty of back up compasses. Should last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Pettus III

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great package
customer_reviews.text: This was more than I expected. I bought this to aid in my oil pastel art, and the quality is fantastic. Since I bought all my supplies at once I was looking for a good deal. I didn’t truly expect it to be great quality too. The variety of compasses have made my circular cuts very precise. The protractors have made my moon shapes amazing. This package is worth much more than they sell it for. I’m extremely impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Love Quality Starter Set goes beyond the typical cheap protractors at big box stores.
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute & Sturdy little set. I love good math tools just to have around. Hopefully my little ones will love these too. I like to be prepared, so I bought these long before my kids will actually need them for school. And the 2 pointy tips compass will help me with me punching earring jewelry cards for my posh business selling jewelry. : ) yay! Win win win
customer_reviews.author: amandamariebrinkley

customer_reviews.title: A bit of overkill, but its included
customer_reviews.text: You really do get a lot of stuff. My son has geometry this year and didn't let me know while we were out shopping for school supplies. So many different types of compasses and protractors, my son has multiple backups so I don't need to deal with replacing lost tools through the year. Comes with a handy plastic case so he doesn't accidentally stab himself, I remember how painful and scary those compass tips are.
customer_reviews.author: Taco

customer_reviews.title: good tools
customer_reviews.text: I liked that my order arrived quickly, and was safely packaged. These items were for my grandson and his geometry class. I was so happy to find a set that included everything he needed, and more. The packaging was neat and compact, and all items were easy to view. The quality is great, and I can see that they will provide the help my grandson will need in class.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient geometry set for students
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for my 8th grader to get her arms around construction, and very convenient to have all the major tools in one package. The compass was kind of flopping a bit when we got it. Had to tighten the two screws to get it work right. Not a big deal at all -- in case you get a device that does not seem to be holding its angle.
customer_reviews.author: Musicfan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces of the the item we received from Amazon were badly crushed. I reached out to Mr Pen's customer service requesting replacing the broken pieces. They (Ms Kara) sent me the whole item, free of charge, immediately! And the replacement order I just received was placed on 4th of July! The item itself is super fun and well made. It's perfect to complement and fun to Math and STEM studies. Great item and great customer service. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: GeekyBee

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set! It was even better than I thought it would be. I loved that it included everything one could need when purchasing such a set, including the extra leads for the compasses, a pen, eraser and sharpener! They thought of everything! The quality is there too, the items are not at all cheap or flimsy... They're very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Margretdzn

customer_reviews.title: Very good pack of tools
customer_reviews.text: Great pack of things our son needed for his math. He's enjoying learning how to use each thing. Arrived quickly & the bag it came in is great for keeping everything in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: Quality you will like it
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome I saw a couple reviews that it wasn't sturdy they must have been using a mallet on it if you saw you would think it was expensive The mechanical pencil isn't thick enough for me but the rest wow what a deal
customer_reviews.author: BruthaLeon

customer_reviews.title: Good set square with lot of extra peices
customer_reviews.text: The pen set square is pretty good and it includes lot of extra pieces like 2 pencils, lead pencil, eraser etc. however I realized some of the pieces are not very usable like metal divider, bow compass etc however I end up paying cost for them. Also the display should be little bigger so that Kids don’t get confused
customer_reviews.author: Hema

customer_reviews.title: Math project
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the kit, I wish I had something like this when I was going to school. It had everything my niece needed to do her project, but you know kids do not appreciate these things, so my sister and I will be using it, because we know she will have another project that she will need it for. So thanks very much.
customer_reviews.author: Party Pearl

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I started teaching my granddaughter 6th grade math and realized I did not have the proper tools for geometry. My husband ordered me the Mr. Pen 15pc set. You get a lot of tools for $10! They all fit in a handy little pouch. Geometry was already fun but now it is even more fun. This is a great starter kit for your aspiring mathematicians. The tools are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Janine

customer_reviews.title: The protractor and rulers are good. They aren't flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The protractor and rulers are good. They aren't flimsy. I have an issue with the click pencil that was included. The top isn't even attached to the pencil. It keeps falling off when I try to use it. That went right in the trash. The compasses are...okay. They move easily, so I have to constantly adjust it back to where it was before. Mr Pen actually refunded my money without my asking because of the issues I had. That was really decent of them, so I'm adding a star to my rating for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Decent Tools, Decent Price
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty decent tools. My only problem was that the 45 degree square was cracked on the bottom but I think I can fix that. They are made of plastic so I know cracks and chips are bound to happen. I really only got the set for the metal compasses but the other tools are good to have for when I am drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: No measuring compass.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice little value package. But I just assumed it would have a compass with a measure on it to draw or measure circles with particular radii. None of the included compasses have that. Just beware in case that is what you need. Other than that, very responsive customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Publius

customer_reviews.title: $10=full set!
customer_reviews.text: That's great! It contains all the tools, even though they are very small. Before I buy it, I just need a compass. Ten dollars includes all the basic tools. High cost performance! Quality problem? No, I think they can work as long as they don't throw them to pets.
customer_reviews.author: Jiayuan

customer_reviews.title: [DISCLAIMER] Not the ideal kit for the less advanced
customer_reviews.text: I can't say good enough things about this compact math and geometry essential kit. I initially bought it to rough out a tattoo pattern [ I'm Type 1 insulin dependent diabetic, with no one to contact if something happens to me]. So I came up with a Diabetic tattoo pattern. This kit is perfect for the symmetry need in my pattern. IT'S AWESOME..!
customer_reviews.author: Verle

customer_reviews.title: Good value, friendly company
customer_reviews.text: Comes with the necessities for geometry and then some. You'll never be missing a compass or be lacking in replacement parts, comes with plenty of lead for graphic compass and three pencils for study compass (even has extra lead for the mechanical pencil). Every measuring device has both inches and centimeters with the relevant unit clearly marked. The casing houses all the tools compactly, making it ideal for students and those who need to take these tools anywhere with them. The company itself was very receptive to some questions and concerns I had and responded to me within hours of me messaging them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful, but disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these, as it seems like a great set, but the set square rulers are not square. You can see in my picture when I align the two set square rulers side by side that they are not even square with one another. Your lines will be off if you are trying to use these for any type of geometry or architect work.
customer_reviews.author: Matpr

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This set was extremely cheap at $10, and essentially what I expected. The two regular orange pencils were not included in the set though? Not that I planned to use them. Two of the compasses are nice tools that function great. One of the compasses, the one that lets you hold any arbitrary writing tool, holds the point loose, and it can fall out. Unfortunately, this is the one tool I wanted the set for. The small protractor was cracked through when I received the set. If these quality issues were fixed, the set would actually be quite nice. The tools are all easy to read and have a nice feel to them. Overall, for $10 it could be worse.
customer_reviews.author: Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great Set -- well thought out -- Excellant Value
customer_reviews.text: All the items seemed to be of good quality and should last the entire school year if not beyond. My only complaint is the pouch is a tad too small so that you have to make sure you put in all the items a certain way so it will close. I bought a larger 3-hole zippered pouch so it would be easier for my son to put everything back -- I thought he would either break something trying to get it in, especially if he was in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Superior set for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the value. We purchased this set for our middle schooler and it is a precise and easy to use set. Tools are of good quality for the price and many tools. You have multiple options as per your preference for some of the tools. All tools easily fit into the included pouch which makes it easy to carry to school.
customer_reviews.author: dcwadleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Perfect for my College Geometry class
customer_reviews.text: Really great set! Comes with a ton of tools. I gave one compass to my classmate and kept one for myself and we both loved it. Compasses can be tricky to use and if not built with quality parts you can get really wonky circles, this is NOT the case with this set. Perfectly smooth circles every time. If you like a really stiff compass you can use a phillips screwdriver to tighten the angle, or loosen it if you like a more collapsing compass style. Can't beat this for the price. Perfect for students of all ages. Good quality build, compasses are a metal/plastic combo. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these products is better than I anticipated. I'm teaching my son Geometry (I homeschool), and we needed supplies. So far, so good. The only trouble I've had is that the little plastic zipper came apart. But I managed to get it back together (and if you knew me, you'd know what a big deal that is!).
customer_reviews.author: MGKerri

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for a really good price
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the price. Comes with lots of pieces. I didn’t check to see how small the compasses were but I’m not upset about it. I was disappointed to find that the protractor had a crack in it. Also, when it was delivered, the stickers holding closed had come off and all of the items were strewn about inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set for all my crazy angles!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!!!! It contains all of the equipment I needed; the quality is excellent - not flimsy at all!!, and it comes all in a great little zipper pouch. And it arrived super quick!!! This set is a perfect match for kids in school, college students, and adults! Highest recommendation for this product and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: muttley

customer_reviews.title: I like the price and the quality was pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the quality was pretty good.The light grey compass was pretty loose.I was a little afraid to try tightening the screws. (Can I) I also broke the case. I bought the set to make my own geometric shapes for doing stained glass. It will work fine for me. I like the clear easy to handle rulers.
customer_reviews.author: patricia major

customer_reviews.title: Compasses are completely USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Although lots of stuff for the price the problem lies in the compass and it's purpose. First of all the compasses do not measure anything so if the teacher asks you to draw this size of circle you can't. So I was thinking well maybe these compasses are just for drawing? Well the problem there is they do not lock so you start out with one size circle and by the time you get all the way around you are drawing a larger circle. What is the point of these compasses? Completely useless
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product, but you get what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.text: Come with a zip bag so you can store all tools in the bag. all those are made with cheap material, so don't expect the accuracy too much, but for this price, you get all the tools you need at once which is not bad. it's good for kid's school math class supply, if you wants to do some engineering drawing, you batter find other one with higher accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my compass set yesterday. I have not had a chance to put it to use just yet. Everything appears to be of good quality. The metal pieces are heavy and sturdy. They feel good in my hand. My opinion at this time, I would say this kit is of good quality and is good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete set for Geometry. We had shopped elsewhere and got some items piece by piece. The quality of this complete set is way better compare to those individual items. The price of this set is so good that you are getting a set for the price of 2 protractors. This is definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great for school or shop!
customer_reviews.text: The Mr. Pen Geometry Set is a great, inexpensive set with everything you need for school math lessons, basic drafting jobs, hobby crafting designing and many other activities. The compasses are well-made and don't slip, and the protractor and rulers are accurate. Good buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and fun
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing and fun. I use it when I am working with my students on geometry problems, and it helps put them at ease because of the Mr. Pen symbol
customer_reviews.author: OrganoChem72

customer_reviews.title: A very nicely made set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value set. All the compasses are metal, very well made and feel solid in the hand. The set squares and protractors are plastic but the edges are smooth not like some sets I've had before. You can buy sets on Amazon for double and triple the price but you will not get anything better quality. Would recommend for a high schooler, college student or anyone else who needs these kinds of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Hobbiest's Friend
customer_reviews.text: Great little set. I'm a hobby wood worker and picked up this set to help me draw up the plans and I'm not disappointed. Perfect size for this and a great bang for your buck. My only complaint is that the bag it comes in is a little too small for the protractor if you want to close the bag and easily get it out. Overall it's a high quality great set for the money you pay.
customer_reviews.author: James Sartori

customer_reviews.title: Super deal
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I just can’t get over the value of this purchase. I do a ton of layout for woodworking design and build out prototypes. I must have a decent compass. There are several in this package. I even liked the eraser and triangles. If you’re thinking about this just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Borzych

customer_reviews.title: Quality drawing set
customer_reviews.text: I've found this set of drawing instruments to be an excellent purchase. I have bought higher priced sets and this set of instruments is just as satisfying to be drawing with. The compasses are good enough to hold its position during the operation of circles and arcs. There is also adequate amount of instruments to get a small scale project drawn. I really enjoyed using this set tools. I feel it is a quality buy and value.
customer_reviews.author: Roddy Yoshimura

customer_reviews.title: Everyone was impressed
customer_reviews.text: This was an item for my 8th grader. She was actually excited about all the items in the kit. She took them out immediately and tried ever item out. Her dad even got involved. He was also impressed with them as he uses these items at his work. I really thought I was going to haft to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little set, except the bag was torn😕
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest set! Everything is like miniature. Perfect for school but I'll use it in my drawing bag I take with me to sketch outside. They have a nice little bag they come in I liked, except it was torn where the zipper is. That was a bummer, but I'll clip it shut.😕 That's why the 4 stars. And its got to be perfect for kids! The size is perfect for their small hands! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Moustache Mistake
customer_reviews.text: All I really wanted was a compass, but I got a bunch of other stuff I don’t want or need. Everything is very cheaply made and neither compass is full size and won’t fit a regular pencil. The eraser was awful and I do use a couple of the plastic straight edges, but other than that...don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: flutesofchichi

customer_reviews.title: Protractors are great, but compasses don't lock in place
customer_reviews.text: My DD is struggling to bisect angles and find the midpoint of lines using the different compasses as none of them come with a locking mechanism and they slip during drawing making her measurements imprecise. I will have to buy a separate compass the locks. Otherwise, it's a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Half Dome climbers

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy set for students or teachers
customer_reviews.text: This set is complete and sturdy, coming in its own handy carrying case. Unlike most products, the case is actually large enough to HOLD all the items! The compasses will work for keeping the lead completely steady, unlike the plastic ones at big box stores selling school supplies. Constructions in geometry will be much more accurate now that we have this in our hands!
customer_reviews.author: parojarvi

customer_reviews.title: Great collection!
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what my middle school son was looking for! We had a minor issue with the straight ruler included in the set but their customer service was very fast to respond and promptly resolved the issue! For the money, it seems the set is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Protractor wont slide.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Giving only 3 stars because the protractor sticks at 130 degrees and is very gard to push further. The company offers free replacements. So, when I receive the replacement I will update to 5 stars. Everything else seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hawkyard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty protractors of many types! Great value for the $. Re-usable zipper pouch!
customer_reviews.text: The set is VERY good for the price! However there are so many different protractor types that my 13 yr old son was confused on what they were for, and nothing explained which item was which or what it was for. The pouch was re-usable to me, and was easily clipped into the binder and sealed closed which I liked. Definitely sturdy material for the $ and would buy again no doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my daughter’s math class. The value is amazing for all the items she needed. They even give you extra bottles of tiny lead for the compass. I’d definitely recommend this and will be purchasing another one for my son when he moves up into her class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item  with a lot of extras,
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item with a lot of extras and my son, who is in high school, loved it and was very happy with it, the important thing he said was that they were metal which is needed to last longer with him.
customer_reviews.author: eugin

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These do what we need and they seem durable. The only issue is it would be great if they came in their own organizer. However, I didn't buy them for the packaging, so I am pleased with the product and durability since this needs to last through all of my children.
customer_reviews.author: Mama5

customer_reviews.title: Low quality and might not last. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The price point is OK but still the quality is very poor. Rather than stuffing 15 unnecassary items in the bag, the focus should have been on making important items useful and sturdy. Disappointed and I hope it last one semester. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Good Rulers
customer_reviews.text: The overall set idea was a good one. Unfortunately the compass do not set the diameter dimension. The compass setting tends to move creating an inaccurate circle. A compass with a screw set point would be really great. The rulers are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to prepare her for grade 5 math. I am very happy so far with the purchase. Also, I was thinking that I would have needed to buy a case to keep everything but I didn't have to do that as it came nicely packed in its very own case.
customer_reviews.author: Nicka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am creating a quilt and needed this kit to make the templates. This kit contains absolutely everything I need and in a size that is perfect ie not large and bulky like most kits. This was delivered quickly and in excellent condition and everything works beautifully. Am very pleased with this purchase and Mr Pen. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for woodworking
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't purchased just for geometry or math for children or highschool. This set is perfect for making measures and doing hobbyist measurements as well for woodworking. The toolset is perfect, pieces are durable and sure to last a long time. Comes with plenty of replacement pieces of lead, and a GREAT set for any drafting kit to have for hobbyist or replacement pieces! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Black

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pieces, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for the compasses. There are a few different sizes and types in this kit, and they seem to be heavy and made out of high quality materials. The kit also comes with spare points and lead tips. Good value, definitely.
customer_reviews.author: jen86

customer_reviews.title: Completely junk
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the cost. Plastic is cheap and breaks easy. Compasses bend so they can’t draw a decent circle. And the pencil material is the softest and worst. It won’t hold a point and turns to powder under the slightly pressure. Avoid this set, spend more on something that actually works
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go around a Hogg’s asz to get ham sandwich, just order already
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing! It has everything and then some, it’s like getting a family size bag chips for a snack size price.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This bundle in way more than I was expecting. First off I was only looking for a simple drawing compass, nothing fancy, when I saw this package with a great price, I ordered it. I am very glad I did! They work great, and it was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for drawing. It is chock full of items. It is just what I wanted. So glad I ordered it. Everything is well made and sturdy. This will set will last. It comes in a zipper pouch too which is perfect for storing and transporting. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: MizDoreen

customer_reviews.title: I guess this is absolutely a very good product at this price
customer_reviews.text: I guess this is absolutely a very good product at this price . My daughter who is 9 yrs oldand geeting introduced to Geometry just loved it .Well packed and with accessories like pencil and erasers. I loved the prompt shipping and the post follow up customer servicce from the representatives of Mr. Pen. 100% recommend this product for students. .
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed a protractor for her geometry homework and this was a great value. I was surprised when it arrived the high quality of each product in the set was and that it came in a really great pouch making it easy to keep together.
customer_reviews.author: Srn24

product_meta.title: Mr. Pen Geometry Set with 6 Inch Swing Arm Protractor, Divider, Set Squares, Ruler, Compasses and Protractor, 15 Piece Set
feature_bullets: Geometry Set For All Levels Designed in USA

Package Includes 15 Piece: 2 Metal Compasses (1 Study Compass & 1 Graphic Compass), 1 Extra Lead for Graphic Compass, 1 Metal Divider, 2 Pencils for Compass, 1 Mechanical Pencil (0.5 mm) for Compass, 1 Pack of 0.5 mm Lead for Mechanical Pencil, 1 Eraser, 1 Metal Pencil Sharpener, 1 Ruler (6”), 1 Set Square (30°/60°), 1 Set Square (45°), 1 Protractor, 1 Protractor with Swing Arm (6”)
15 Piece Geometry Set, Compass Set in a Reusable Pouch, Easy to Carry and Store
The Math Set/Geometry Set Designed by Experienced Math Experts with All Essential Items for Teachers and Students at Any Level

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,843 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
